entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow squalls. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow squalls and flurries at times heavy. Local amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow squalls and flurries at times heavy changing to flurries this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
